text: price Discovery moves now the final thing that this could be is part of a much bigger portfolio or bigger trade theme just because there's one individual strike that's being transacted in one individual expiration doesn't inherently mean that that's the only thing that that person is looking at so if we take a look at the size of the trades for these puts which are right here we can see this I would wager this is the same entity getting in at a couple different points in time I'm just guessing I don't know but that's what it seems like to me and the first trade went out for 620k the second one went out for 381k so these are not small this is not going to be a standard retail Trader this is probably going to be part of a much bigger book that's being traded and it could be hedging activity because of some short GameStop position that they're trying to take risk off coming out not this far in time for that hedge would be very sus to me it wouldn't make a lot of sense Beyond the fact that you're not paying a lot of extrinsic value this is essentially all intrinsic value so that could be the case or it could be something that just complements a broader portfolio rarely do options Traders look at each individual options tra uh trade and kind of analyze it in a vacuum we don't really care about

text: extrinsic value this is essentially all intrinsic value so that could be the case or it could be something that just complements a broader portfolio rarely do options Traders look at each individual options tra uh trade and kind of analyze it in a vacuum we don't really care about that we care about it in context but what I really care about is if I have options in this stock this stock this stock this stock this stock what is my overall net Deltas across everything what is my overall gamma What's My overall Theta what's my vulga like I care about those things because all of those options are going to move in different ways and you have to pay attention to the total risk that you have out and how so Cliff noes version I have no idea who this is or what it is there's nothing in this that's like shocking to me this is pretty common for these really deep in the money options there's going to be trades that come through like this you can see that there was 268 that were um net added on the 105 so it's like that doesn't totally surprise me to see these changing the way that they are but it is always fun to talk about how markets behave and why these kinds of things can be going on so those are a few reasons it could be somebody speculating it could be somebody hedging it could
